## ErrorDetails type

Provides details for errors occurring while sending or retrieving {<!-- -->Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V3.Dto.TranslationJob<!-- -->}<!-- -->s.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ErrorDetails = {
    ErrorType?: string;
    ExceptionDetails?: ExceptionDetails;
    JobId?: number;
    JobTitle?: string;
    NumberOfTries?: number;
    Severity?: ErrorSeverity;
    SourceLanguageId?: string;
    TargetLanguageId?: string;

    TcmItemNewTargetTitle?: string;
    TcmItemSourceTitle?: string;

};
```
